question: Whats is multimedia file?
options: is same as any other regular file
must be accessed at specific rate
stored on remote server can not be delivered to its client
answer: must be accessed at specific rate

question: In which type of streaming multimedia file is delivered to the client, but not shared?
Which one of the following is the characteristic of a multimedia system?
options: both high storage and high data rates
answer: both high storage and high data rates

question: In teardown state of real time streaming protocol is ___________
options: server delivers the stream to client

question: Multimedia system require hard real time scheduling ___________
options: to ensure critical tasks will be serviced within timing deadlines
to deliver the media file to the client
answer: to ensure critical tasks will be serviced within timing deadlines
